item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

This webinar will focus on highlighting a number of tools. These tools are useful for financially analyzing rental properties. This review will include an extensive review of Microsoft Excel.

You will learn that Excel is not only a great tool for organization of data, but also a great tool for calculations that are perfect for the serious real estate investor.

RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

Â
item.name: Learn to Analyze an Investment Rental Property: Excel & Other Tools - Webinar
